name: X-Wing Fighter
description: A detailed replica of the iconic X-Wing Fighter, featuring retractable landing gear and opening cockpit.

name: Millennium Falcon
description: The fastest hunk of junk in the galaxy, perfect for any Star Wars fan's collection.

name: Darth Vader Action Figure
description: A detailed action figure of Darth Vader, complete with a removable cape and lightsaber accessory.

name: Luke Skywalker Action Figure
description: Luke Skywalker as seen in *The Empire Strikes Back*, with a lightsaber and blaster accessory.

name: Yoda's Lightsaber
description: A small yet powerful lightsaber replica modeled after Yoda's weapon of choice.

name: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber
description: A striking replica of Kylo Ren's cross-guard lightsaber, with light and sound effects.

name: TIE Fighter
description: An accurate model of the Imperial TIE Fighter, featuring wing panels that can detach during battles.

name: Stormtrooper Action Figure
description: A highly detailed Stormtrooper action figure, complete with a blaster rifle accessory.

name: Slave I
description: Boba Fett's iconic starship, featuring rotating wings and a cockpit that fits action figures.

name: Rebel Soldier Action Figure
description: A detailed Rebel Soldier figure, complete with a blaster rifle and battle-ready stance.

name: Mace Windu's Lightsaber
description: A stunning replica of Mace Windu's purple lightsaber, featuring light and sound effects.

name: Imperial Shuttle
description: A collectible model of the Imperial Shuttle, with foldable wings and a detailed cockpit.

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi Action Figure
description: An Obi-Wan Kenobi action figure from the Clone Wars, complete with a blue lightsaber accessory.

name: The Darksaber
description: A replica of the ancient and unique black-bladed lightsaber wielded by Mandalorians.

name: Speeder Bike
description: A high-speed speeder bike model with articulated features for display and play.

name: Ahsoka Tano Action Figure
description: Ahsoka Tano in her Clone Wars outfit, featuring dual lightsabers and intricate detailing.
